Source: _fixed/base/_theme.styl, line 64

10.3 Theme Function 

// Sample Code
@import '../../stylus/_fixed/base/_theme.styl'
.example1
  .example2
    themeBackgroundColor('main')


// Yielding the following CSS
.gray_green .example1 .example2 {
  background-color: #2e2e2e;
}
.blueGray_green .example1 .example2 {
  background-color: #313444;
}

  • Set the theme color to background-color.

    themeBackgroundColor($colorName)

  • Set the theme color to color.

    themeColor($colorName)

  • Set the theme color to border-color.

    themeBorderColor($colorName)

  • Set the theme color to fill.

    themeFill($colorName)
